title: Ground News - Exonerated man speaks on wrongful conviction, finding peace in art
text: Daniel Gwynn's Summary by Abc 6 Philadelphia paintings are filled with color and tell the dramatic story of how he was wrongfully convicted, put on death row and served nearly 30 years in prison before finally being freed 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] abc 6 Philadelphia Daniel Gwynn's paintings are filled with color and tell the dramatic story of how he was wrongfully convicted, put on death row and served nearly 30 years in prison before finally being freed 41 minutes agoÂ·Philadelphia, United StatesRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
